structuredRule: If cancelDateTime is not empty then value must be greater than or equal to current date.
errorMessageDescription: cancelDateTime must be equal to or larger than Today's Date.

structuredRule: If targetMarketSubdivisionCode is not empty then value must be valid for targetMarketCountryCode.
errorMessageDescription: targetMarketSubDivisionCode is not valid with the targetMarketCountryCode.

structuredRule: GLN of information provider or dataSource must be Registered in Global Registry.
errorMessageDescription: GLN of information provider/data source does not exist in global registry.

structuredRule: If gtin is in GDS Global Registry  then it must not be changed or corrected.
errorMessageDescription: GTIN number cannot be changed or corrected

structuredRule: If Registry Catalogue Item (gtin,gln,targetmarket) is in GDS Global Registry then dataSource/gln cannot change.
errorMessageDescription: The dataSource must not change after the Registry Catalogue Item is in the Global Registry.

structuredRule: If cancelDateTime has been populated at the global registry then cancelDateTime must not be updated with a 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' Document Command.
errorMessageDescription: Cancel date cannot change; must be corrected

structuredRule: If the discontinuedDate has been populated at the global registry then the discontinuedDate must not  be updated with a 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' Document Command.
errorMessageDescription: Discontinued date cannot change; must be corrected

structuredRule: If CatalogueItemReference is not in GDS Global Registry then documentCommandCode must not equal 'CHANGE' or 'CORRECT'.
errorMessageDescription: GLN, GTIN, Target Market Key does not exist in the Global Registry

structuredRule: If cancelDateTime is not empty then value must be greater than registrationDateTime.
errorMessageDescription: Cancel DateTime must be after Registration DateTime

structuredRule: If discontinuedDateTime is not empty then value must be greater than registrationDateTime.
errorMessageDescription: Discontinued Date must be after Registration Date

structuredRule: dataRecipient/gln must be in GDS Party Registry.
errorMessageDescription: Data Recipient GLN does not exist

structuredRule: There must be at least one iteration of gtin, targetMarket gpcCategoryCode or dataSource/gln.
errorMessageDescription: Data Recipient needs to provide at least one key attribute (GTIN, Category, Target Market or Data Source GLN)

structuredRule: If gtin is not empty then gpcCategoryCode must be empty.
errorMessageDescription: Category code and gtin cannot be an input together

structuredRule: If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is equal to 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH' then ChildTradeItem/gtin must be empty.
errorMessageDescription: A parent item with a tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH may not contain a child item.

structuredRule: If specialItemCode does not equal 'DYNAMIC_ASSORTMENT' and parent trade item netWeight and child trade item netWeight are used then parent netWeight shall  be greater than or equal to the sum of (netweight multiplied by quantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) of each child item.
errorMessageDescription: If net weight is populated on both parent and child items, then net weight of the parent shall be greater than or equal to the  sum of the net weight of all the children except when special item code = "DYNAMIC_ASSORTMENT".

structuredRule: If the AVP is a Fast Track attribute, then it must follow the defined rules(facets, specified code values, etc).. If the AVP is a Fast track atribute and is defined as a complex structure, then it should be sent as a complex AVP
errorMessageDescription: <attribute>  <value> does not comply with attribute value as defined in the current Business Requirements Document

structuredRule: You can pass a null value when using a 'CORRECT' or 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' command to reset discontinuedDateTime or cancelDateTime.
errorMessageDescription: You can pass a null value when using a 'CORRECT' or 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' command to reset discontinuedDatetime or cancelDateTime.

structuredRule: If discontinuedDateTime is used then cancelDateTime shall be empty.
errorMessageDescription: The discontinuedDateTime and the cancelDateTime were both set for the same item  or the CatalogueItem and TradeItem discontinuedDatesTime and cancelDateTime were not the same.

structuredRule: Only an originating Data Pool for that party record should be able to change it.
errorMessageDescription: Only an originating Data Pool for that party record should be able to change it

structuredRule: If grossWeight is not empty and netWeight is not empty then grossWeight must be greater than or equal to netWeight.
errorMessageDescription: If grossWeight and netWeight are provided on the same record, grossWeight must be greater than or equal to netWeight

structuredRule: If specialItemCode does not equal 'DYNAMIC_ASSORTMENT' then the sum of all quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem shall equal totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem.
errorMessageDescription: Sum of quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem shall equal totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem except when special item code = 'dynamic_assortment'.

structuredRule: dataRecipient must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: Attribute dataRecipient is required to be populated in a Catalogue Item Notification message.

structuredRule: If isTradeItemADespatchUnit equals 'true' then tradeItemWeight/grossWeight SHALL be greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription:
Gross Weight (tradeItemWeight/grossWeight) must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero when Shipping Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit) equals 'true'.

Gross weight (tradeItemWeight/grossWeight) must be used and have a value greater than zero when Shipping Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit ) equals ‘true’.
passExample:
isTradeItemADespatchUnit = 'true'
gpcCategoryCode = '10008179' (Coffee - Ground Beans)
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight = 1000 GRM

isTradeItemADespatchUnit = 'true'
gpcCategoryCode = '10008339' (Rail Equipment)
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight is not used

tradeItemWeight/grossWeight = 50 KGM
isTradeItemADespatchUnit = 'True'
failExample:
isTradeItemADespatchUnit = 'true'
gpcCategoryCode = '10008179' (Coffee - Ground Beans)
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight is not used

Fail
isTradeItemADespatchUnit = 'true'  
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight = 0 GRM.

Fail
isTradeItemADespatchUnit equals 'true' 
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight not used

structuredRule: EntityIdentification/PartyIdentification/gln shall equal dataSource, contentOwner and informationProvider and shall be the same for all levels of trade item hierarchy.
errorMessageDescription: Value for contentOwner shall be the GLN of the dataSource and informationProvider and shall be consistent in all levels of the item hierarchy within the message

structuredRule: If isReturnableAssetEmpty does not equal “true” or is not used for any item in a Catalogue Item Notification Message then isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit must be equal to 'true' for at least one item in a Catalogue Item Notification Message.
errorMessageDescription: isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit must be true for at least one GTIN within a hierarchical configuration.

structuredRule: If minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction is not empty and minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival is not empty then minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction must be greater than or equal to minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival.
errorMessageDescription: minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction must be greater than or equal to minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('008' (Albania), '051' (Armenia), '031' (Azerbaijan), '040' (Austria), '112' (Belarus), '056' (Belgium), '070' (Bosnia-Herzegovina), '100' (Bulgaria), '191' (Croatia), '196' (Cyprus), '203' (Czech Republic), '208' (Denmark), '233' (Estonia), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), '276' (Germany), '268' (Georgia), '300' (Greece), '348' (Hungary), '352' (Iceland), '372' (Ireland), '376' (Israel), '380' (Italy), '398' (Kazakhstan), '417' (Kyrgyzstan), '428' (Latvia), '440' (Lithuania), '442' (Luxembourg), '807' (Macedonia), '498' (Moldova), '499' (Montenegro), '528' (Netherlands), '578' (Norway), '616' (Poland), '620' (Portugal), '642' (Romania), '643' (Russia), '688' (Serbia), '703' (Slovakia), '705' (Slovenia), '756' (Switzerland), '792' (Turkey), '795' (Turkmenistan), '826' (United Kingdom), '804' (Ukraine), or '860' (Uzbekistan)) and isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and (gpcCategoryCode is in GPC Family '50202200' and gpcCategoryCode does not equal ('10000142', '10000143', '10008029', '10008030', '10008031', '10008032', '10008033', ' 10008034', '10008035') then percentageOfAlcoholByVolume SHALL be used.
errorMessageDescription:
Alcohol Percentage (percentageOfAlcoholByVolume) is not used. For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, 
This attribute is required for all items on the lowest level of the hierarchy for Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) <gpcCategoryCode gpcCategoryName>.

structuredRule: If dangerousGoodsRegulationCode is equal to 'ADR' and dangerousGoodsPackingGroup is not empty then dangerousGoodsPackingGroup must equal  ('NA','I', 'II' or 'III').
errorMessageDescription: If dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ADR' and dangerousGoodsPackingGroup is not empty then dangerousGoodsPackingGroup must equal  ('NA','I', 'II' or 'III').

structuredRule:
If a start dateTime and its corresponding end dateTime are not empty then the start date SHALL be less than or equal to corresponding end date.

If a start dateTime and its corresponding end dateTime are not empty then the start date must be less than or equal to corresponding end date.
errorMessageDescription:
Dates in <start date attribute> and <end date attribute> are not consistent. The end date <end date value> cannot be earlier than the start date <start date value>.

Start dates cannot occur after their corresponding end dates if both dates are populated

structuredRule: Sender/Identifier/authority must equal 'GS1' .
errorMessageDescription: The ‘Authority’ value in Sender and Receiver  must be set to GS1.

structuredRule: DocumentIdentification/standard must equal 'GS1'.
errorMessageDescription: The  Document Identification Standard value must be set to GS1.

structuredRule: DocumentIdentification/type must equal valid GS1 Document.
errorMessageDescription: The value of Type  must be set to a valid GS1 document name.

structuredRule: If message type is response or exception then the class Scope shall be used.
errorMessageDescription: Business Scope class shall be present in the response or exception  message.

structuredRule: If Scope/Type is populated then Scope/Type shall equal 'GDSN’.
errorMessageDescription: The value of Business Scope type shall be set to "GDSN".

structuredRule: CorrelationInformation/RequestingDocumentInstanceIdentifier must equal original message instance identifier.
errorMessageDescription: Value of  CorrelationInformation RequestingDocumentInstanceIdentifier is not recognized, it must be original message instance identifier

structuredRule: Document/EntityIdentification must be unique for a Command.
errorMessageDescription: The same Document ID may not be repeated within the same Command

structuredRule: DocumentCommandIdentification/EntityIdentification must be unique for a Transaction.
errorMessageDescription: The same  Command ID may not be repeated within the same Transaction

structuredRule: TransactionIdentification/EntityIdentification must be unique for a Message.
errorMessageDescription: The same Transaction ID may not be repeated within the same Message

structuredRule: DocumentIdentification/InstanceIdentifier must be unique across all messages.
errorMessageDescription: The same Document Identification InstanceIdentifier  may not be repeated on multiple messages

structuredRule: Instance Document (Message) must be well formed.
errorMessageDescription: General XSD failure - not well formed, not referencing correct namespaces

structuredRule:
If a minimum and corresponding maximum are not empty then the minimum SHALL be less than or equal to the corresponding maximum.

If a minimum and corresponding maximum are not empty then the minimum must be less than or equal to the corresponding maximum.
errorMessageDescription:
Values in <minimum attribute> and <maximum attribute> are not consistent. The maximum <maximum value> cannot be smaller than the minimum value <minimum value>.

Minimums cannot be greater than their corresponding maximums: AttributeException/attributeName

structuredRule: A message must have at most one iteration of documentType and a transaction must have at most one iteration of commandType.
errorMessageDescription: Must limit to 1 document type per message and 1 command type per transaction.

structuredRule: If ChildTradeItem/gtin is empty then attribute isTradeItemABaseUnit must be equal to 'true'.
errorMessageDescription: If the item does not have a child item, the value of isTradeItemABaseUnit must be true.

structuredRule: If ChildTradeItem/gtin is not empty then attribute isTradeItemABaseUnit must be equal to 'false'.
errorMessageDescription: If the trade item has a child item the value of isTradeItemABaseUnit must be false.

structuredRule: The priceSynchronisationDocumentIdentification must be unique within a  Price Synchronisation relationship.
errorMessageDescription: The priceSynchronisationDocumentIdentification is not unique for this relationship in Price Synchronisation.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals 036 (Australia) or 554 (New Zealand) then the priceSynchronisationDocumentIdentification shall be sequential within a  Price Synchronisation relationship.
errorMessageDescription: The priceSynchronisationDocumentIdentification is not sequential for this Price Synchronisation relationship for targetMarketCountryCode equal to 036 (Australia), 554 (New Zealand).

structuredRule: The priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification shall be unique for a data source in Price Synchronisation.
errorMessageDescription: The  priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification is not unique within this data source in Price Synchronisation.

structuredRule: Attribute value must use code list values associated with the data type in Business Message Standard.
errorMessageDescription: Attribute value must use code list values associated with the data type in Business Message Standard.

structuredRule: PriceSynchronisationRelationship/priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification must equal PriceSynchronisationDocument/priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification
errorMessageDescription: The priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification in the Relationship Segment and the Relationship ID in the price synchronization header are not equal.

structuredRule: If the datatype of an attribute equals CurrencyCode, then its value SHALL be the 3-character alphabetical code from Code List ISO 4217.
errorMessageDescription: CurrencyCode dataType shall be the 3 character representation found in the ISO 4217 codelist

structuredRule: If  the datatype of an attribute equals languageCode then its value shall be a code from the Code List ISO 639.
errorMessageDescription: The LanguageCode shall be the 2-5 character representation found in the ISO 639 list.

structuredRule: If incotermCodeLocation is not empty then incotermCode must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If incotermCodeLocation is populated, the incotermCode must also be populated.

structuredRule: The priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification must be unique within a data source in Price Synchronisation.
errorMessageDescription: The  priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification is not unique within this data source in Price Synchronisation.

structuredRule: If conditionType equals 'BRACKET' then bracketTierMinimum and bracketRangeQualifierCode must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If conditionType  equals 'BRACKET', you must provide both bracketTierMinimum and bracketRangeQualifierCode.

structuredRule: If gpcCategorycode is used, then its value shall be in the list of official GPC bricks as published by GS1 and currently adopted in production by GDSN.
errorMessageDescription: If populated, the GPC Category Code  must be a valid GPC value that has been implemented in GDSN.

structuredRule: If conditionApplicationSequence is not empty then conditionType must equal 'ALLOWANCE' or 'CHARGE'.
errorMessageDescription: If conditionApplicationSequence is not empty then the conditionType must equal  'ALLOWANCE'  or 'CHARGE'.

structuredRule: If conditionApplicationSequence is not empty then value must be greater than 1.
errorMessageDescription: If the conditionApplicationSequence is not empty, it must be greater than 1.

structuredRule: The  priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification must be unique within an information provider in Price Synchronization.
errorMessageDescription: The priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification  must be unique within an information provider in Price Synchronization.

structuredRule: If instances of ItemPriceType/shipFrom are greater than 1 then instances of ItemPriceType/shipTo must equal 1.
errorMessageDescription: If multiple business location ship froms exist, there can be only 1 business location ship to.

structuredRule: If instances of ItemPriceType/shipTo are greater than 1 then instances of ItemPriceType/shipFrom must equal 1.
errorMessageDescription: If multiple business location ship tos exist, there can be only 1 business location ship  from.

structuredRule: The   Target Condition must be unique within an information provider in Price Synchronization.
errorMessageDescription: The Target Condition must be unique within an information provider in Price Synchronization.

structuredRule: If  PriceSynchronisationCondition/priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification is not empty then the  SegmentEffectiveStartDateInformation/effectiveStartDateTime must be greater than or equal to current date.
errorMessageDescription: If populated, the Target Condition must have an effective end date value that is not in the past.

structuredRule: If priceDocumentType does not equal 'INITIAL_LOAD' and the PriceSynchronisationCondition is used then the target condition shall have a priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus equal to 'RECEIVED', 'REVIEW' or 'SYNCHRONISED'.
errorMessageDescription: The Target Condition shall be in the accept, synchronize or review status in the price sync list except for First Initial Load.

structuredRule: If PriceSynchronisationCondition is not empty then PriceSynchronisationCondition/conditionType must equal 'BRACKET'.
errorMessageDescription: If the  Target Condition is referenced, it must be of type = bracket.

structuredRule: If PriceSynchronisationCondition is not empty then BracketQualifier/bracketTierMinimum,  BracketQualifier/bracketTierMaximum,  BracketQualifier/bracketRangeQualifierCode, BracketQualifier/bracketOperator must be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If the PriceSynchronisationCondition  is populated, the bracket tier minimum,  bracket tier maximum, bracket range qualifier and bracket operator for the Item Price Type cannot be populated.

structuredRule: The TargetPriceType must be unique for an information provider in Price Synchronization.
errorMessageDescription: The TargetPriceType must be unique within a information provider in Price Synchronization.

structuredRule: If targetPrice is used then the target price effectiveEndDateTime shall be greater than or equal to current date.
errorMessageDescription: If populated, the effectiveEndDateTime in the TargetPriceType cannot have a date that is in the past.

structuredRule: If priceDocumentTypeCode does not equal 'INITIAL_LOAD' and the targetPriceType is used then the target price shall have a priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus equal to 'RECEIVED', 'REVIEW' or 'SYNCHRONISED'.
errorMessageDescription: The TargetPriceType shall be in the accept, synchronize or review status in the price sync list except for First Initial Load.

structuredRule: If targetPricetype is not empty then the target price priceTypeCode must not equal 'ALLOWANCE' or 'CHARGE'.
errorMessageDescription: If the TargetPriceType is referenced, the PriceType code of that TargetPriceType must not be Allowance or Charge.

structuredRule: If ItemPriceType/priceTypeCode does not equal 'ALLOWANCE' or 'CHARGE' then priceTypeApplicationSequence must equal 1.
errorMessageDescription: All PriceTypes, other than PriceType = ‘Allowance’ or ‘Charge’, must be assigned a PriceTypeApplicationSequence = 1.

structuredRule: If conditionType is considered a summary condition then conditionApplicationSequence shall not equal '1'.
errorMessageDescription: ConditionApplicationSequence = 1 is not a valid Application Sequence for Summary Conditions.

structuredRule: priceSynchronisationDocumentIdentification must not be empty and must be unique per information provider.
errorMessageDescription: The  priceSynchronisationDocumentIdentificationmust be present and unique within a information provider in Price Synchronization.

structuredRule: PriceSynchronisationDocument/priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification must not be empty and must be unique per information provider.
errorMessageDescription: Within the header, the  priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification  must be present and unique within a information provider in Price Synchronization.

structuredRule: If priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus is equal to 'REVIEW' then  confirmationStatusReasonCode and actionNeeded must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatusReason is Review,  both Reason Code and ActionNeeded must be provided.

structuredRule: PriceSynchronisationConfirmation/PriceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification shall equal an existing priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification.
errorMessageDescription: The PriceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification included in the PriceSynchronisationConfirmation shall reference an existing Price Synchronisation Relationship identified by a priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification.

structuredRule: PriceSynchronisationSegmentConfirmation/PriceSynchronisationConditionIdentification must equal an existing priceSynchronsiationConditionIdentification.
errorMessageDescription: The PriceSynchronisationConditionIdentification included in the PriceSynchronisationConfirmation must reference an existing Price Synchronisation Condition identified by a priceSynchronsiationConditionIdentification.

structuredRule: priceSynchronisationSegmentConfirmation/itemPriceTypeSegmentIdentification/entityIdentification shall equal an existing itemDepictionQualifier/itemPriceType/itemPriceTypeSegmentation/entityIdentification from a PriceSynchronisationDocument
errorMessageDescription: itemPriceTypeSegmentIdentification/entityIdentification does not refer to an existing ItemPriceTypeSegment as identified in a PriceSynchronisationDocument by itemDepictionQualifier/itemPriceType/itemPriceTypeSegmentation/entityIdentification.

structuredRule: If percentageOfAlcoholByVolume is not empty then value must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 100.00.
errorMessageDescription: If populated, percentageOfAlcoholByVolume  must be greater than or equal to 0.00 and smaller than or equal to 100.00 by definition.

structuredRule: The receiving data pool may fail optional messages within the GDS Network that are not supported by the receiving data pool.
errorMessageDescription: The receiving DP is failing this message because it does not support this optional functionality.

structuredRule: If PriceSynchronisationCondition/conditionTypeCode is equal to 'BRACKET' then conditionValue, conditionValueType, priceValueQualifierCode, priceTypeApplicationSequence and priceBasisQuantity must be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If condition type = 'BRACKET', then Condition Value, Condition Value Type, Qualifier, Basis Quantity, Basis Quantity UOM, and Application Sequence cannot be populated.

structuredRule: If PriceSynchronisationCondition/conditionType is equal to 'BRACKET' then at least one iteration of BracketQualifier must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If Condition Type = 'BRACKET', then at least one bracket qualifier sub-class must be provided.

structuredRule: If priceTypeCode is not empty then conditionType must be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If the priceTypecode is populated, then conditionType cannot be populated.

structuredRule: If instances of PriceSynchronisationCondition/BracketQualifier are greater than 1 then bracketOperatorCode must equal 'AND' or 'OR'.
errorMessageDescription: If you provide more than one bracket qualifier in a Condition segment, then the bracket operators must either be all 'AND' or all 'OR'.

structuredRule: If instances of ItemPriceType/BracketQualifier are greater than 1 then bracketOperator must equal 'AND' or 'OR'.
errorMessageDescription: If you provide more than one bracket qualifier in a Item Price Type segment, then the bracket operators must either be all 'AND' or all 'OR'.

structuredRule: If dangerousGoodsRegulationCode is equal to 'ADR' and classOfDangerousGoods is not empty then classOfDangerousGoods must equal ('1', '2', '3', '4.1', '4.2', '4.3', '5.1', '5.2', '6.1', '6.2', '7', '8'or '9').
errorMessageDescription: If classOfDangerousGoods is populated and dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ADR', then classOfDangerousGoods must be one of the following values: '1', '2', '3', '4.1', '4.2', '4.3', '5.1', '5.2', '6.1', '6.2', '7', '8', '9'.

structuredRule: The PriceSynchronisationDocument/EntityIdentification/contentOwner must equal the PriceSynchronisationRelationship/EntityIdentification/contentOwner
errorMessageDescription: Content Owner GLN must be same as relationship segment GLN

structuredRule: If a PriceSynchronisationRelationship is in a status of 'REJECTED'  then any subsequent associated ItemDepictionQualifier and PriceSynchronisationCondition are not valid.
errorMessageDescription: The price data is not valid for price synchronization because the recipient previously rejected the relationship and it is in reject state.

structuredRule: A reject response to a trade item price type segment indicates that the recipient no longer wishes to receive any price type segment related to that catalogue trade item.  As a result no subsequent pricing can be made on that trade item in the reject status.
errorMessageDescription: The trade item is not valid for price synchronization because the recipient previously rejected a price type segment for the trade item.

structuredRule: A priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus shall not equal  'REJECTED' for a condition segment.
errorMessageDescription: A reject segment cannot be sent on a condition segment

structuredRule: If priceDocumentType is equal to 'RESTART' then DocumentCommand must equal 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' and all instances of ItemPriceType must have priceActionCode equal to 'ADD'.
errorMessageDescription: If the Price Document Type is 'RESTART', the Synchronisation Header Action Code must equal ‘CHANGE_BY_REFRESH’ and all Item Price Types sent must have a Segment Action Code equal to 'ADD'.

structuredRule: If  confirmationStatusReasonCode and actionNeeded are not empty then priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus must be equal to 'REVIEW' .
errorMessageDescription: If a Price Synchronisation confirmationStatusReasonCode or actionNeeded is provided priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus must be in the status of 'REVIEW'.

structuredRule: A PriceSynchronisationConfirmation for a segment is not valid if a PriceSynchronisationConfirmation message has been received with a priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus equal to 'REJECTED'.
errorMessageDescription: If a Price SynchronisationConfirmation is received from a data recipient after a previous confirmation has been sent for the segment with priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus of 'REJECTED', the newly received PriceSynchronisationConfirmation is invalid

structuredRule: If isTradeItemPackedIrregularly equals ‘FALSE’ and tradeItemCompositionWidth, tradeItemCompositionDepth and quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem are all supplied and tradeItemCompositionWidth/measurementUnitCode and tradeItemCompositionDepth/measurementUnitCode equal ‘EA’ then the product of the three attributes should equal the totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem.
errorMessageDescription: If isTradeItemPackedIrregularly equals ‘FALSE’ and tradeItemCompositionWidth, tradeItemCompositionDepth and quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem are all supplied and tradeItemCompositionWidth/measurementUnitCode and tradeItemCompositionDepth/measurementUnitCode equal ‘EA’ then the product of the three attributes should equal the totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem.

structuredRule: If attribute datatype is equal to gtin then it must have a valid check digit.
errorMessageDescription: This GTIN has an incorrect check digit.

structuredRule: If attribute datatype equals gln then it must be a 13 digit number and have a valid check digit.
errorMessageDescription: This GLN has an incorrect check digit and or has incorrect length and values.

structuredRule: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to  'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then netContent must not be updated.
errorMessageDescription: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to  'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then netContent must not be updated.

structuredRule: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then priceComparisonMeasurement must not be updated.
errorMessageDescription: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then priceComparisonMeasurement must not be updated.

structuredRule: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and the Document Command equals  'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then BrandNameInformation/brandName shall not be updated.
errorMessageDescription: The value for brandName is not allowed to be changed according to GTIN allocation rules.

structuredRule: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem must not be updated.
errorMessageDescription: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem must not be updated.

structuredRule: If the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH then ChildTradeItem/gtin shall not be updated.
errorMessageDescription: childTradeItem GTIN is not allowed to be changed according to GTIN allocation rules

structuredRule: ChildTradeItem/gtin must not equal TradeItem/gtin
errorMessageDescription: The  GTIN cannot be a child of itself.

structuredRule: TradeItem/gtin must not equal parent Trade Item TradeItem/gtin.
errorMessageDescription: A GTIN cannot be repeated under the same parent.

structuredRule: For a given Price ID, effectiveEndDateContextCode and effectiveStartDateContextCode are allowed to repeat. However, the repeat can only be from the remaining un-used code values.
errorMessageDescription: Price Type Effective Start or End Date Contexts may only repeat using a previously un-used code value

structuredRule: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) and SegmentEffectiveEndDateInformation/effectiveEndDateTime is not empty then value must be greater than or equal to current date.
errorMessageDescription: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)), then the SegmentEffectiveEndDateInformation/effectiveEndDateTime must be a date equal to or after Today's date

structuredRule: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) then priceValue must be greater than or equal to 0.
errorMessageDescription: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)), then you must populate a Price Value; this value must be greater than or equal to zero.

structuredRule: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) and alternateLocationGrouping is not empty then priceTargetMarketSubdivision and shipTo must be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) then, if the Alternate Location Grouping is populated, then the priceTargetMarketSubdivision and shipTo locations must be empty.

structuredRule: priceValueType must be equal to 'PERCENTAGE' or 'VALUE'.
errorMessageDescription: You must populate a Price Value Type as either 'VALUE' or 'PERCENTAGE'

structuredRule: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode equals ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand))  then priceActionReason shall be used.
errorMessageDescription: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode equals ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand))  then the reason for priceActionReason shall be provided

structuredRule: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) then the codeDescription of tradeItemGroupIdentificationCodeReference must be equal for all Items with the the same tradeItemGroupIdentificationCodeReference.
errorMessageDescription: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) then the Trade Item Group ID Description must be the same for all GTINs within a Trade Item Group ID

structuredRule: If packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity is not empty then value must be greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription: Zero or negative values are not allowed for Packaging Material Composition Quantity where provided

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528' (Netherlands) then gtin must not include the following company prefixes 0020 to 0029, 0040 to 0049 or 0200 to 0299.
errorMessageDescription: For Target Market '528' (Netherlands) codes  starting with 0020-0029, 0040-0049, 0200-0299 are not allowed.

structuredRule: If data type is equal to  gtin then attribute value must be a  valid GTIN-8, GTIN-12, GTIN-13 or GTIN-14 number.
errorMessageDescription: If data type is equal to  gtin then attribute value must be a  valid GTIN-8, GTIN-12, GTIN-13 or GTIN-14 number.

structuredRule: If childTradeItem/gtin is used, then the corresponding tradeItem/gtin SHALL exist in the same CIN document.
errorMessageDescription:
For each GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) of the Contained Product
(childTradeItem/gtin) in the hierarchy that is populated in the next lower level trade item information, the GTIN SHALL have a corresponding item record inside the same CIN document.
passExample:
CIN 1 record
childTradeItem/gtin=01234567890128
CIN 1 different record
tradeItem/gtin=01234567890128
failExample:
CIN 2 record
childTradeItem/gtin= 01234567890128
CIN 2 does not contain tradeItem/gtin=01234567890128

structuredRule: If isTradeItemPackedIrregularly is equal to 'false' and (quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem and  quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer are not empty) then quantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem must equal quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem multiplied by value in quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer.
errorMessageDescription: if isTradeItemPacked Irregularly = False then Value in quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem must be equal to value in quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem multiplied by value in quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer

structuredRule: If dataCarrierTypeCode is equal to 'EAN_8' then the first six digits of the TradeItem/GTIN shall equal '000000'.
errorMessageDescription: If dataCarrierTypeCode is equal to 'EAN_8' then the first six digits of the TradeItem/GTIN shall equal '000000'.

structuredRule: targetMarketCountryCode and (targetMarketSubdivisionCode if not empty) must be consistent across item hierarchy.  Example: If parent item targetmarketCountryCode is equal to '840' then child item cannot have a targetMarketCountryCode equal to '340'.
errorMessageDescription: The Target Market Country Code and targetMarketSubdivisionCode when populated,  will be consistent for all GTINs within a given hierarchy

structuredRule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and (maximumTemperature, minimumTemperature, flashPoint/flashPointTemperature or hazardousInformationHeader/flashPointTemperature are used) then at least one iteration of the associated measurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'CEL'.

If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('752' (Sweden), '203' (Czech Republic), '250' (France), '208' (Denmark), '246' (Finland), '040' (Austria), or '703' (Slovakia)) and maximumTemperature , minimumTemperature or FlashPoint/flashPointTemperature are used then at least one instance of the associated measurementUnitCode shall equal 'CEL'.
errorMessageDescription:
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the unit of measure for <attribute> must be specified in degrees Celsius.

Unit of measures for maximum, minimum temperatures and flashPointTemperature shall be specified as degrees Celsius for this target market.

structuredRule: If nestingIncrement is not empty then value must be greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription: If nestingIncrement is populated it must be greater than zero(0).

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528' (Netherlands) then stackingFactor must not be greater than 99.
errorMessageDescription: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528' (Netherlands): Invalid value for trade item stacking factor

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528'  (Netherlands) then logisticsUnitStackingFactor must not be greater than 99.
errorMessageDescription: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528' (Netherlands): Invalid value for the non-GTIN logistic unit stacking factor

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528' (Netherlands) and quantityOfLayersPerPallet  is not empty then value must be less than 999.
errorMessageDescription: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528' (Netherlands): Invalid value for trade layers per pallet

structuredRule: On first population endAvailabilityDateTime shall be later than or equal to today.
errorMessageDescription: endAvailabilityDateTime shall be later than or equal to today on first population.

structuredRule: discontinuedDateTime must only be updated  with documentCommand of 'CORRECT'.
errorMessageDescription: discontinuedDateTime must only be updated  with documentCommand of 'CORRECT'.

structuredRule: lastChangeDateTime SHALL be later than or equal to the previously sent value.
errorMessageDescription: lastChangeDateTime for a trade item must be the same or later than previously sent value

structuredRule: If maximumHumidityPercentage and minimumHumidityPercentage are used then value shall be greater than, or equal to '0' and less than or equal to '100'.
errorMessageDescription:
Maximum and minimum humidity shall be expressed as a percentage with a value between '0' and '100'. 
E.g. '97' meaning 97%

structuredRule: There must be at most 1000 transactions per message.
errorMessageDescription: There is a limit of 1000 Transactions within 1 Message

structuredRule: There must be at most 1 command per transaction.
errorMessageDescription: There is a limit of 1 Command type within 1 Transaction

structuredRule: There must be at most 100 Documents per transaction.
errorMessageDescription: There is a limit of 100 Documents within 1 Transaction

structuredRule: sh:StandardBusinessDocumentHeader/sh:HeaderVersion shall equal current approved network version.
errorMessageDescription: Header version in Standard Business Document Header is not the current  version approved for the network. See documentation for expected value.

structuredRule: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/height shall not be 20 percent greater than current version height.
errorMessageDescription: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/height shall not be 20 percent greater than current version height.

structuredRule: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/width shall not be 20 percent greater than current version width.
errorMessageDescription: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/width shall not be 20 percent greater than current version width.

structuredRule: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall not be 20 percent greater than current version depth.
errorMessageDescription: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall not be 20 percent greater than current version depth.

structuredRule: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/grossWeight shall not be 20 percent greater than current version grossWeight.
errorMessageDescription: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/grossWeight shall not be 20 percent greater than current version grossWeight.

structuredRule: There shall be at most 25 iterations of Class GDSNTradeItemClassificationAttribute per Class GDSNTradeItemClassification.
errorMessageDescription: Maximum number of iterations of GDSNTradeItemClassificationAttributeType  is  25

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('752' (Sweden), '528' (Netherlands), '203' (Czech Republic) or '246' (Finland)) and packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity is used then in at least one iteration of packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity the related packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity/@measurementUnitCode SHALL equal 'KGM' or 'GRM'.
errorMessageDescription: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the Packaging Material Quantity (packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity) unit of measure <packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity/@measurementUnitCode> is incorrect. The unit of measure SHALL be gram (GRM) or kilogram (KGM).
passExample:
targetMarketCountryCode='203' (Czech Republic)
packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity= 15 GRM
packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity= 0.53 ONZ

structuredRule: If packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity and packagingWeight are not empty then the sum of all instances of  packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity for the trade item must be less than or equal to packagingWeight.
errorMessageDescription: The total of values in packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity may not exceed the value in packagingWeight for the same item .

structuredRule:
If isTradeItemNonPhysical equals 'false' or is not used then tradeItemMeasurements/depth SHALL be greater than 0.

If isTradeItemNonPhysical does not equal 'TRUE' then there must be exactly one instance of TradeItemMeasurements/depth greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription:
Depth/Length (tradeItemMeasurements/depth) must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if isTradeItemNonphysical equals 'false' or is not used. Use an average value for variable measure items.

For items that are  physical,  depth must be provided and value must be greater than zero (use an average for variable measure items)
passExample:
isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008179' (Coffee - Ground Beans)
tradeItemMeasurements/depth = 70 MMT

isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008339' (Rail Equipment)
tradeItemMeasurements/depth is not used
failExample:
isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008179' (Coffee - Ground Beans)
tradeItemMeasurements/depth is not used

structuredRule:
If isTradeItemNonPhysical equals 'false' or is not used then tradeItemMeasurements/height SHALL be greater than 0.

If isTradeItemNonPhysical does not equal 'TRUE' then there must be exactly one instance of TradeItemMeasurements/height greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription:
Height (tradeItemMeasurements/height) must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if isTradeItemNonphysical equals 'false' or is not used. Use an average value for variable measure items.

For items that are  physical,  height must be provided and value must be greater than zero (use an average for variable measure items)
passExample:
isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008179' (Coffee - Ground Beans)
tradeItemMeasurements/height = 200 MMT

isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode= 10008339 (Rail Equipment)
tradeItemMeasurements/height is not used
failExample:
isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008179' (Coffee - Ground Beans)
tradeItemMeasurements/height is not used

structuredRule:
If isTradeItemNonPhysical equals 'false' or is not used then tradeItemMeasurements/width SHALL be greater than 0.

If isTradeItemNonPhysical does not equal 'TRUE' then there must be exactly one instance of TradeItemMeasurements/width greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription:
Width (tradeItemMeasurements/width) must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if isTradeItemNonphysical equals 'false' or is not used. Use an average value for variable measure items.

For items that are  physical, width must be provided and value must be greater than zero  (use an average for variable measure items)
passExample:
isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008179' (Coffee - Ground Beans)
tradeItemMeasurements/width = 100 MMT

isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008339' (Rail Equipment)
tradeItemMeasurements/width is not used
failExample:
isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008179' (Coffee - Ground Beans)
tradeItemMeasurements/width is not used

structuredRule: If  grossWeight is not empty then value shall be greater than or equal to 0.
errorMessageDescription: Negative values are not allowed for Gross Weight

structuredRule: If netWeight is not empty then value must be greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription: Zero or negative values are not allowed for Net Weight where Net Weight is Provided

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode not equal to '752' (Sweden) and (Audio Visual Media Product Description Module or Publication Title Rating Module or Audio Visual Media Content Information Module) are used and gpcCategoryCode is equal to '10001137' then audioVisualMediaProductTitle, genreTypeCodeReference, titleRatingCodeReference/Code, titleRatingCodeReference/codeListAgencyCode and gameFormatCode shall be used.
errorMessageDescription: If (Audio Visual Media Product Description Module or Publication Title Rating Module or Audio Visual Media Content Information Module) are used and gpcCategoryCode is equal to '10001137' then audioVisualMediaProductTitle , genreTypeCodeReference , titleRatingCodeReference/Code, titleRatingCodeReference/codeListAgencyCode  and gameFormatCode shall be used.

structuredRule: If  targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden) and layerHeight is not empty then value must equal child item width, depth or height.
errorMessageDescription: If  targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden) layerHeight must have the same value as one of the values in width, depth or height of the child item.

structuredRule: If  targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) and priceBasisQuantity is used then related measurementUnitCode shall equal 'KGM', 'GRM', 'MTR','MLT', 'MMT', 'LTR', 'MTK', 'MTQ' or 'H87'.
errorMessageDescription: If  targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) priceBasisQuantity may be specified with the following units of measures: kilogram, gram , metre, millimetre, millilitre, litre, square metre, cubic metres,piece.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden) and isTradeItemOrderable is equal to 'true'  and additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode  is equal to ('SUPPLIER_ASSIGNED' or 'DISTRIBUTOR_ASSIGNED') then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification must be unique within hierarchy.
errorMessageDescription: If  targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden), additionalTradeItemIdentificationValue ('SUPPLIER_ASSIGNED', 'DISTRIBUTOR_ASSIGNED') may not have the same value on more than one Trade Item in the same item hierarchy. This rule applies when isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit is equal to 'true'.

structuredRule: If dataCarrierTypeCode equals ('EAN_13', 'UPC_A' or 'UPC_E') then first digit of gtin shall equal '0'.
errorMessageDescription: If dataCarrierTypeCode equals ('EAN_13', 'UPC_A' or 'UPC_E') then first digit of gtin shall equal '0'.

structuredRule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' then netContent SHALL be used.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('036' (Australia), '554' (New Zealand), '752' (Sweden), '348' (Hungary), '124' (Canada), '840' (United States), '208' (Denmark), '246' (Finland), '250' (France), or '380' (Italy)) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' then netContent SHALL be used.
errorMessageDescription:
For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Net Content (netContent) is mandatory on consumer units (Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals to 'true').

netContent is not used. This attribute shall be used if isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals ‘true’ for <<targetMarketCountryCode name>>.
passExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = '208' (Denmark)
isTradeItemAConsumerUnit = 'true'
netContent = 50 KGM

targetMarketCountryCode = '040' (Austria)
isTradeItemAConsumerUnit = 'true'
netContent is not used

netContent = 50 KGM
isTradeItemAConsumerUnit = ‘True’
targetMarketCountryCode = '208' (Denmark)

netContent = ‘’
isTradeItemAConsumerUnit = ‘True’
targetMarketCountryCode = '040’ (Austria)
failExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = '208' (Denmark)
isTradeItemAConsumerUnit = 'true'
netContent is not used

netContent = ‘’
isTradeItemAConsumerUnit = ‘True’
targetMarketCountryCode = '208' (Denmark)

structuredRule: If orderingLeadTime is not empty, then value must be greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription: If provided, Ordering Lead Time must be greater than zero

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '036' (Australia) and dutyFeeTaxTypeCode is equal to 'WET' then percentageOfAlcoholByVolume must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If Target Market is '036' (Australia) and taxTypeCode is equal to 'WET' (Wine Equalisation Tax), then percentageOfAlcoholByVolume must be populated

structuredRule: If priceBasisQuantity is not empty then value must be greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription: The Price (or Allowance) Basis Quantity must be greater than zero.

structuredRule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer is used then quantityOfLayersPerPallet SHALL be used.

If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia),
'348' (Hungary),
'554' (New Zealand),
'528' (Netherlands),
'056' (Belgium) or
'442' (Luxembourg)) and quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer is not empty then quantityOfLayersPerPallet must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription:
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Number of Units per Layer in a Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer) is used, then Number of Layers per Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfLayersPerPallet) must be used.

If QuantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer is used, then QuantityOfLayersPerPallet shall be used for this target market.
failExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = '528' (Netherlands)
quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer = 12
quantityOfLayersPerPallet is not used
constrainedParty:
Source Data Pool

If QuantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer is used
then QuantityOfLayersPerPallet shall be used for this target market.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('752' (Sweden)) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit is equal to 'true' then functionalName must not contain a value from brandName or descriptiveSizeDimension.
errorMessageDescription: functionalName may not contain the same text as brandName or descriptiveSizeDimension when IsTradeItemAConsumerUnit is equal to 'true'.

passExample:
dutyFeeTaxCategorycode = 'LOW'
targetMarketCountryCode = '528' (Netherlands)
gpcCategoryCode = 10006894 (small Domestic Appliances - other)

dutyFeeTaxCategorycode = ''
targetMarketCountryCode = '528' (Netherlands)
gpcCategoryCode = 10000487 (Hearing Aids)
failExample:
dutyFeeTaxCategorycode = ''
targetMarketCountryCode = '528' (Netherlands)
gpcCategoryCode = 10006894 (small Domestic Appliances - other)

structuredRule: If minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival is not empty then value must be greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription: If populated, minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival must be greater than zero.

structuredRule: If minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction is not empty then value must be greater than 0.
errorMessageDescription: If populated, minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction must be greater than zero.

structuredRule: If grossWeight is used and netContent/measurementUnitCode is a weight then grossWeight shall be greater than or equal to netContent.
errorMessageDescription: Value in grossWeight shall be greater than or equal to value in netContent if this is given as weight. Allowance shall be made for different units of measure.

structuredRule: If parent item platformTypeCode is equal to '11', and the child platformTypeCode is equal to '10' then quantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem of the parent item must not be greater than 2.
errorMessageDescription: Value in quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem may not exceed 2 when the pallet type is any type of full size pallet and the child item's pallet type is any type of half size pallet. Full size pallets are:  ISO 1 Pallet (code 11)

structuredRule: If the datatype of an attribute references a code list managed by an external agency, then only values in this list shall be used.
errorMessageDescription: {insert_attribute_name} contains an invalid value. Used code {insert_incorrect_value} is not included in the relevant external code list”.

structuredRule: If code list agency for a code attribute represents GS1 then only valid GS1 managed code list can be used.
errorMessageDescription: {insert_attribute_name} contains an invalid value. Used code {insert_incorrect_value} is not included in the relevant GS1 code list”.

structuredRule: If individualUnitMinimumSize and/or individualUnitMaximumSize are not empty then isTradeItemABaseUnit must equal 'true'.
errorMessageDescription: If individualUnitMinimum and/or individualUnitMaximum are populated, then  isTradeItemABaseUnit must be 'true'

structuredRule: If isTradeItemABaseUnit is equal to 'false' then individualUnitMinimumSize and individualUnitMaximumSize must be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If isTradeItemABaseUnit is equal to 'false', then individualUnitMinimum and/or individualUnitMaximum should never be populated.

structuredRule:
If isTradeItemNonphysical equals 'false' or is not used then tradeItemWeight/grossWeight SHALL be greater than 0.

If isTradeItemNonphysical  does not equal 'true' then grossWeight shall not be empty.
errorMessageDescription:
Gross Weight (tradeItemWeight/grossWeight) must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if isTradeItemNonphysical equals 'false' or is not used.

grossWeight shall be included at all levels where isTradeItemNonphysical does not equal 'true'.
passExample:
isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008179' (Coffee - Ground Beans)
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight = 1000 GRM

isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008339' (Rail Equipment)
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight is not used
failExample:
isTradeItemNonphysical is not used
gpcCategoryCode = '10008179' (Coffee - Ground Beans)
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight is not used

structuredRule: If specialItemCode does not equal 'DYNAMIC_ASSORTMENT' and grossWeight is used, then grossWeight SHALL be greater than 0.96 multiplied by the ((Parent trade Item packagingWeight if used) + (Sum of (Parent trade item quantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem multiplied by Child GTIN grossWeight))).
errorMessageDescription:
The GTIN's Gross Weight (grossWeight) shall be greater than 96% of the sum of the GTIN's Packaging Weight (packagingWeight) and the Gross Weight (grossWeight) of all its next lower-level child items. 
Combined calculated weight of GTIN's Packaging Weight with its next lower-level items is currently: <combined weight>.

Gross Weight (grossWeight) of the GTIN MUST BE greater than 96% of the sum of that GTIN’s packagingWeight if available, plus the sum of the Gross Weight (grossWeight) of all next lower-level child items. 
NOTE: This allowance of 4% in the sum, is due to some configurations where part of the packaging of child items is removed, such as in displays.
passExample:
Trade item:
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight = 17 KGM
packaging/packagingWeight = 1.4 KGM

Child items:
quantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem = 24
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight = 650 GRM

Combined weight = 16.32 KGM (96% of 17 KGM)
failExample:
Trade item:
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight = 17 KGM
packaging/packagingWeight = 1.4 KGM

Child items:
quantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem = 24
tradeItemWeight/grossWeight = 700 GRM

Combined weight = 17.472 KGM (96% of 18.2 KGM)

structuredRule: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is equal to 'TRANSPORT_LOAD'  and parent item exists then parent item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode must equal 'TRANSPORT_LOAD'.
errorMessageDescription: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can only be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD'.

structuredRule: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is equal to 'PALLET' and parent item exists then parent item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode must equal 'TRANSPORT_LOAD' or 'PALLET'.
errorMessageDescription: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is 'PALLET', and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can only be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD' or 'PALLET'.

structuredRule: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is equal to 'PALLET' then child item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode must not equal 'TRANSPORT_LOAD' .
errorMessageDescription: If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'PALLET', and the item has a children, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD'.

structuredRule: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is equal to 'CASE' then parent item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode must not equal 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH' or 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK'.
errorMessageDescription: If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'CASE', and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can never be 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH' or 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK.'

structuredRule: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is equal to 'CASE' then child item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode must not equal 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'MIXED_MODULE' or ' PALLET'.
errorMessageDescription: f tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'CASE' and the item has a children, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'MIXED_MODULE' or 'PALLET'.

structuredRule: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is equal to 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK' then parent item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode must not equal 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH'.
errorMessageDescription: If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK' and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can never be 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH'.

structuredRule: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is equal to 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK' then child item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode must not equal 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'PALLET', 'MIXED_MODULE', 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'CASE'.
errorMessageDescription: If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK', and the item has (a) child(ren), then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'PALLET', 'MIXED_MODULE', 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'CASE'.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden) and isTradeItemADespatchUnit is equal to 'true' then stackingFactor must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: stackingFactor is mandatory for Despatch Units in target market '752' (Sweden).

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden) and functionalName is not empty then exactly one iteration of functionalName must have a languageCode equal to 'sv'.
errorMessageDescription: If populated, one iteration has to be in Swedish for functionalName for TM '752' (Sweden).

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode does not equal ('756' (Switzerland), '276' (Germany), '040' (Austria), '528' (Netherlands), '056' (Belgium), '442' (Luxembourg), 203 (Czech Republic), or '250' (France)) and uniformResourceIdentifier is used and referencedFileTypeCode equals 'PRODUCT_IMAGE' then fileFormatName SHALL be used.
errorMessageDescription: For this target market <targetMarketCountryCode>, fileFormatName is mandatory, if uniformResourceIdentifier is used and referencedFileTypeCode equals the value 'PRODUCT_IMAGE'.

structuredRule: If uniformResourceIdentifier is used and referencedFileTypeCode equals  'PRODUCT_IMAGE' and targetMarketCountryCode does not equal  756 (Switzerland), 276 (Germany), 040 (Austria), 528 (Netherlands) then fileName shall be used.
errorMessageDescription: fileName is mandatory if uniformResourceIdentifier is used and typeOf Information contains the value 'PRODUCT_IMAGE' unless  targetMarketCountryCode equals 756 (Switzerland), 276 (Germany), 040 (Austria), 528 (Netherlands).

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden) and dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode is not empty then dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode must equal '9SE'.
errorMessageDescription: The dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode must be '9SE' if target market is '752' (Sweden).

structuredRule: lastChangeDateTime must not be greater than current date.
errorMessageDescription: lastChangeDateTime for a trade item may not be a date in the future.

structuredRule:
If  targetMarketCountryCode equals ('528' (Netherlands) or '246' (Finland)) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and gpcCategoryCode is not in GPC Segment ' 51000000' then tradeItem/gtin SHALL not begin with values "1" through "9".

If  targetMarketCountryCode equals '528' (Netherlands) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and gpcCategoryCode is not in GPC Segment ' 51000000' then tradeItem/gtin shall not be a GTIN-14.
errorMessageDescription:
For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if the Global Product Category Code of the product is not one of the brick codes in segment '51000000' (Healthcare) and Consumer Unit Indicator
 (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then the GTIN <tradeItem/gtin> SHALL not begin with values "1" through "9".

For target market 528 (Netherlands,) if the GPC code of the product is different from any of the codes under segment '51000000' (Healthcare) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals  'true', then the GTIN of the product cannot be a  GTIN-14

structuredRule: If  isNonGTINLogisticsUnitPackedIrregularly is equal to 'false' then quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet shall equal quantityOfLayersPerPallet multiplied by quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer.
errorMessageDescription: If isNonGTINLogisticUnitPackedIrregularly is equal to 'false' then value in quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet shall be equal to value in quantityOfLayersPerPallet multiplied by value in quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer

structuredRule: If importClassificationTypeCode is not empty then importClassificationValue must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: importClassificationTypeCode and importClassificationValue are used in pairs. If one is populated the other is required.

structuredRule: If importClassificationValue  is not empty then  importClassificationTypeCode must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: importClassificationTypeCode and importClassificationValue are used in pairs. If one is populated the other is required.

structuredRule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('036' (Australia),
'348' (Hungary),
'554' (New Zealand),
'528' (Netherlands),
'056' (Belgium) or
'442' (Luxembourg)) and quantityOfLayersPerPallet is greater than zero then quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer shall be greater than zero.
errorMessageDescription: If quantityOfLayersPerPallet is greater than zero, then quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer shall be greater than zero for this target market.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '840' (US) and growingMethodCode  is equal to 'ORGANIC' then organicClaimAgencyCode and organicTradeItemCode must not  be empty.
errorMessageDescription: If targetMarket equals '840' (US) and growingMethodCode equals 'ORGANIC' then organicClaimAgency and organicTradeItemCode MUST not be empty.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('250' (France), '246' (Finland) or '380' (Italy)) then tradeItemDescription shall be used.
errorMessageDescription: tradeItemDescription is missing. The long description (tradeItemDescription) is mandatory for <<targetMarketCountryCode Name>>.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode does not equal ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand) or 752 (Sweden)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptor is equal to 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE' then platformTypeCode  shall not be empty
errorMessageDescription: platformTypeCode is missing. If targetMarketCountryCode does not equal ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)  or 752 (Sweden)) it is mandatory to specify the pallet type (platformTypeCode) when tradeItemUnitDescriptor is equal to 'PALLET' or ‘MIXED_MODULE’

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH' then placeOfProductActivity/countryOfOrigin shall not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: For target market '250' (France), the country of origin is required for all base units (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH').

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France) then dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode, if used, shall equal  '65'.
errorMessageDescription: When target market code equals '250' (France) the agency maintaining the list of taxes is GS1 France. (dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode = '65').

structuredRule: If freeQuantityOfProduct and netContent are both used, then freeQuantityOfProduct shall be less than or equal to netContent, when expressed in the same measurementUnitCode.
errorMessageDescription: The  free quantity (freeQuantityOfProduct) in a promotional offer shall not exceed the Content net (netContent), when expressed in the same measurementUnitCode.

structuredRule: if drainedWeight and netWeight are not empty then drainedWeight must be less than or equal to netWeight.
errorMessageDescription: If the net drained weight is populated (drainedWeight) the net weight must be less than or equal to its net weight (netWeight).

structuredRule: If childTradeItem/tradeItemIdentification is used then quantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem shall be greater than '0'.
errorMessageDescription: If a trade item has a child trade item   (childTradeItem/tradeItemIdentification), the amount associated with this child (childTradeItem/tradeItemIdentification) shall be informed and be greater than 0.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France)) and (gpcCategoryCode is in Class '50202200' and does not equal '10000142') and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' then at least one iteration of dutyFeeTaxTypeCode shall equal ('3001000002541', '3001000002244', '3001000002312' or '3001000002329').
errorMessageDescription: If target Market equals '250' (France)), consumer units for alcoholic beverages (Cls '50202200' , except Brick '10000142') shall have a dutyFeeTaxTypeCode equal to '3001000002541' (Rights on pre-mixes), '3001000002244' (Tax on cider), '3001000002312' (Rights of alcohol) or '3001000002329'.
passExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = 250
gpcCategoryCode 10000142 (not concerned by the rule)
isTradeItemAConsumerUnit = true
There is no instance of dutyFeeTaxTypeCode with  ('3001000002541' or '3001000002244' or '3001000002312' or '3001000002329').
failExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = 250
gpcCategoryCode belongs to the class '50202200' and does not equal '10000142'
isTradeItemAConsumerUnit = true
There is no instance of dutyFeeTaxTypeCode with  ('3001000002541' or '3001000002244' or '3001000002312' or '3001000002329').

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '372' (Ireland) and if isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and ((gpcCategoryCode is in Class ('50202200' or '50211500') and does not equal ('10000142', '10000143', '10000303' or '10000584')) then at least one iteration of AdditionalTradeItemClassification shall have a value with additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode equal to '57'(REV).
errorMessageDescription: If targetMarketCountryCode equals '372' (Ireland) and if isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and ((gpcCategoryCode is in Class ('50202200' or '50211500') and does not equal ('10000142', '10000143', '10000303' or '10000584')) then at least one iteration of AdditionalTradeItemClassification shall have a value with additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode equal to '57'(REV).

structuredRule: If depositValueEffectiveDateTime is not empty then returnablePackageDepositIdentification or returnablePackageDepositAmount must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: IF depositValueEffectiveDate is populated then returnablePackageDepositIdentification or returnablePackageDepositAmount MUST be populated.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode does not equal <Geographic> and consumerProductVariantStartEffectiveDateTime is used then consumerProductVariantDescription SHALL be used.
errorMessageDescription: For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Product Variant Start Date/Time (consumerProductVariantStartEffectiveDateTime) is used, then Consumer Product Variant Description (consumerProductVariantDescription) shall be used.
passExample:
consumerProductVariantStartEffectiveDateTime = '2023-10-31T07:00:00'
consumerProductVariantDescription = 'Variant description'

consumerProductVariantStartEffectiveDateTime is not used
consumerProductVariantDescription is not used

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to  ('040' (Austria) or '276' (Germany)) and isReturnableAssetEmpty = 'true' then returnableAssetCapacityContent shall not be empty.
errorMessageDescription:
returnableAssetCapacityContent is missing. 
For Target Markets '040' (Austria) and '276' (Germany) returnableAssetCapacityContent is mandatory if returnableAssetEmpty equals 'true'.

structuredRule: discontinuedDateTime shall not be older than effectiveDateTime minus six months.
errorMessageDescription:
discontinuedDateTime shall not be older than effectiveDateTime minus six months.
E.g. effectiveDatetime = 1 December 2016, then  discontinuedDateTime = 15 May 2016 fails, 1 June 2016 passes.

structuredRule: Replaced By Trade Item (referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals 'REPLACED_BY')  shall not equal TradeItem/ tradeItemIdentification.
errorMessageDescription: A trade item can not be replaced temporarily by itself ('REPLACED_BY')

structuredRule: Substituted By Trade Item (referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals 'SUBSTITUTED_BY') shall not equal TradeItem/tradeItemIdentification.
errorMessageDescription: A trade item can not be substituted temporarily by itself ('SUBSTITUTED_BY')

structuredRule: equivalentTradeItem (referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals 'EQUIVALENT') shall not equal TradeItem/tradeItemIdentification.
errorMessageDescription: A trade item can not be substituted temporarily by itself ('EQUIVALENT')

structuredRule: Dependent Proprietary Trade Item (referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals 'DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY') shall not equal TradeItem/tradeItemIdentification.
errorMessageDescription: Dependent Proprietary Trade Item (''DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY') shall not equal TradeItem/tradeItemIdentification.

structuredRule: Item Variant Master (referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals 'ITEM_VARIANT_MASTER') shall not equal TradeItem/tradeItemIdentification.
errorMessageDescription: A trade item can not be the same as the item variant master ('ITEM_VARIANT_MASTER')

structuredRule: Replaced Trade Item Identification (referencedTradeItemTypeCode equals 'REPLACED') shall not equal TradeItem/tradeItemIdentification.
errorMessageDescription: A trade item can not be replaced temporarily by itself ('REPLACED').

structuredRule: If isTradeItemAConsumerUnit is equal to 'true' and targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '840'(United States) then dataCarrierTypeCode must not be empty..
errorMessageDescription: If the Trade Item is a consumer unit, and the target market country code is '840' (US), the type of bar code [dataCarrierTypeCode] is mandatory

structuredRule: There shall be one instance of TradeItem/informationProviderOfTradeItem/gln.
errorMessageDescription: GLN for informationProvider is missing.

structuredRule: TradeItem/informationProviderOfTradeItem/partyName shall be used.
errorMessageDescription: The name of the information provider shall be populated.

structuredRule: startAvailabilityDateTime must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: The startAvailabilityDateTime must be populated for the trade item.

structuredRule:
If targetMarketCountryCode does NOT equal <Geographic> then isTradeItemAConsumerUnit SHALL be used.

If targetMarketCountryCode does not equal ('756' (Switzerland)) then isTradeItemAConsumerUnit SHALL be used.
errorMessageDescription:
Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) must not be empty.

Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) must be populated for the trade item.

structuredRule: isTradeItemADespatchUnit must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: isTradeItemADespatchUnit must be populated for the trade item.

structuredRule: isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit must be populated for the trade item.

structuredRule: isTradeItemAVariableUnit SHALL be used.
errorMessageDescription:
Variable Measure Indicator (isTradeItemAVariableUnit) must not be empty.

isTradeItemAVariableUnit shall not be empty for the trade item.

failExample:

isTradeItemAVariableUnit is not used

structuredRule: if drainedWeight and grossWeight are not empty then drainedWeight must be less than or equal to grossWeight.
errorMessageDescription: If the drained weight is populated (drainedWeight) it must be less than or equal to the gross weight (grossWeight).

structuredRule: targetMarket for a child item cannot be more specific than for the parent. Example: If parent item targetmarketCountryCode is equal to '840' then child item cannot have a targetMarketSubdivisonCode.
errorMessageDescription: targetMarket for a child item cannot be more specific than for the parent. Example: If parent item targetmarketCountryCode is equal to '840' then child item cannot have a targetMarketSubdivisonCode.

structuredRule: If gpcCategoryCode is not empty then gtin must be empty.
errorMessageDescription: Category code and gtin cannot be an input together.

structuredRule: The receiving data pool must not fail valid extensions  to an existing document.
errorMessageDescription: The receiving data pool must not fail valid extensions  to an existing document.

structuredRule: GRAI must have a valid check digit.
errorMessageDescription: GRAI check digit is not valid.

structuredRule:
If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('752' (Sweden),  '203' (Czech Republic) or '246' (Finland)) and PackagingMaterial/packagingMaterialTypeCode is used then PackagingMaterial/packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity SHALL be used.

errorMessageDescription:
For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> then packagingMaterialTypeCode and packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity are used in pairs. I.e. if one is populated the other one must be populated, also.

For this target market then packagingMaterialTypeCode and packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity are used in pairs. I.e. if one is populated the other one must be populated, also.

structuredRule:
If packagingMaterial/packagingMaterialTypeCode does not equal ('COMPOSITE', 'METAL_COMPOSITE', 'LAMINATED_CARTON', 'PAPER_PAPERBOARD' or 'OTHER') then CompositeMaterialDetail class SHALL NOT be used.

If Packaging Material Type Code (packagingMaterial/packagingMaterialTypeCode) does not equal ('COMPOSITE', 'METAL_COMPOSITE', 'LAMINATED_CARTON', 'PAPER_PAPERBOARD' or 'OTHER') then CompositeMaterialDetail class must not be used.

If Packagingmaterial/packagingMaterialTypeCode is not equal to ('COMPOSITE' or 'LAMINATED_CARTON' or 'OTHER' or 'PAPER_PAPERBOARD')then CompositeMaterialDetail class must be empty.

structuredRule: If any attribute of the TradeItemTemperatureInformation class other than temperatureTypeQualifierCode is not empty then temperatureTypeQualifierCode must not be empty.
errorMessageDescription: Use of temperatureTypeQualifierCode is mandatory in case any other attribute of the TradeItemTemperatureInformation class is not empty.

structuredRule: The maximumlength of datatype StringAttributeValuePair is 5000 characters.
errorMessageDescription: The maximum length of data type StringAttributeValuePair is 5000 characters.

structuredRule: If class NonPackagedSizeDimension is used then either descriptiveSizeDimension, sizeDimension or sizeCode shall be used.
errorMessageDescription:
descriptiveSizeDimension, sizeDimension or sizeCode is missing.
If class NonPackagedSizeDimension is used then descriptiveSizeDimension, sizeDimension or sizeCode shall be used.

sizeCode = 2 Diaper/Nappy size 2

Pass 2
sizeTypeCode=BELT_LENGTH
sizeDimension= 85 cm, 34 in

Pass 3
descriptiveSizeDimension= Medium en, Medium de

structuredRule: If TradeItem/brandOwner/gln is not empty then brandOwner/PartyRoleCode shall be empty.

structuredRule: If TradeItem/informationProviderOfTradeItem/gln is used then TradeItem/informationProviderOfTradeItem/partyRoleCode shall be empty.

structuredRule: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/height shall not be less than 80 percent of the current version height.
errorMessageDescription: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/height must not be less than 80 percent of the current version height.

structuredRule: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY'  and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/width must not be less than 80 percent of the current version width.
