gradeCodeReference/@codeListName is not used

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and referencedFileTypeCode equals ('SAFETY_DATA_SHEET', 'DOP_SHEET' or 'DECLARATION_OF_CONFORMITY') then fileLanguageCode SHALL be used.
errorMessageDescription: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Digital Asset Type Code (referencedFileTypeCode) is equal to 'SAFETY_DATA_SHEET', 'DOP_SHEET' or 'DECLARATION_OF_CONFORMITY', then File Language Code (fileLanguageCode) must be used.
failExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = '756' (Switzerland)
referencedFileTypeCode = 'SAFETY_DATA_SHEET'
fileLanguageCode is not used

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and referencedFileTypeCode equals 'PRODUCT_IMAGE' then uniformResourceIdentifier SHALL begin with ('http://' or 'https://').
errorMessageDescription: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Digital Asset Type Code (referencedFileTypeCode) equals 'PRODUCT_IMAGE', then Digital Asset Link (uniformResourceIdentifier) must begin with 'http://' or 'https://'.

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals ('PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE') and child item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode does not equal ('PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE') then child item platformTypeCode SHALL NOT be used.
errorMessageDescription: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE', then child item's Pallet Type Code (platformTypeCode) must not be used unless child item Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE'.
passExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = '756' (Switzerland)
tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode = 'PALLET'
Child Item:
   tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode = 'MIXED_MODULE'
   platformTypeCode = '51'

targetMarketCountryCode = '756' (Switzerland)
tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode = 'PALLET'
Child Item:
   tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode = 'CASE'
   platformTypeCode is not used
failExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = '756' (Switzerland)
tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode = 'PALLET'
Child Item:
   tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode = 'CASE'
   platformTypeCode = '51'

structuredRule: If targetMarketCountryCode equals <Geographic> and certificationIdentification is used and certificationAgency equals 'Additional_Label_Information' then certificationIdentification SHALL equal a code value used for (packagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCode or localPackagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCodeReference).
errorMessageDescription: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Additional Label Information is used, then Certification Identification (certificationIdentification) must equal a code used for Third Party Accreditation Symbol on Product Package Code (packagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCode) or Local Packaging Marked Label Accreditation Code (localPackagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCodeReference).
passExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = '756' (Switzerland)
packagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCode = 'FOREST_STEWARDSHIP_COUNCIL_MIX'
localPackagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCodeReference is not used
certificationAgency = 'Additional_Label_Information'
certificationIdentification = 'FOREST_STEWARDSHIP_COUNCIL_MIX'
failExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = '756' (Switzerland)
packagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCode = 'FOREST_STEWARDSHIP_COUNCIL_MIX'
localPackagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCodeReference is not used
certificationAgency = 'Additional_Label_Information'
certificationIdentification = 'FOREST_PRODUCTS_Z809'

errorMessageDescription: For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) equals <gpcCategoryCode GPC Category Name>, then regulationTypeCode must equal 'EXPLOSIVES_PRECURSORS_REGISTRATION' and Regulation Compliance Indicator must equal 'TRUE' or 'NOT_APPLICABLE'.
passExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = '756' (Switzerland)
gpcCategoryCode = '10000426' (Toilet Cleaning Products)
regulationTypeCode = 'EXPLOSIVES_PRECURSORS_REGISTRATION'
isTradeItemRegulationCompliant = 'TRUE'
failExample:
targetMarketCountryCode = '756' (Switzerland)
gpcCategoryCode = '10000426' (Toilet Cleaning Products)
regulationTypeCode = 'EXPLOSIVES_PRECURSORS_REGISTRATION'
isTradeItemRegulationCompliant is not used

targetMarketCountryCode = '756' (Switzerland)
gpcCategoryCode = '10000426' (Toilet Cleaning Products)
regulationTypeCode is not used
